name: Arts and Education
description: 'SF Kroc Center offers an after-school program, a children's string instrument program, children's arts and music elective classes and children's character building programs referred to as Children's Troop Programs. Does require membership
fullDescription: 'SF Kroc Center offers an after-school program, a children's string instrument program, children's arts and music elective classes and children's character building programs referred to as Children's Troop Programs. Does require membership
whatTheyOffer: 'SF Kroc Center offers an after-school program, a children's string instrument program, children's arts and music elective classes and children's character building programs referred to as Children's Troop Programs. Does require membership
howToGetIt: Monday through Friday 3pm-6pm - Program opens early on Wednesdays for early dismissal. Complete application by going to: https://s3-us-west-1.amazonaws.com/usw-cache.salvationarmy.org/03578778-4fea-4235-bbae-e5c71bfef12d_ASP+%2723-%2724.pdf If you have questions call (415) 345-3408 or send email to Monica Rios, Education Manager: monica.rios@usw.salvationarmy.org Francisco Craig, Education Lead: francisco.craig@usw.salvationarmy.org
cost: vary from free to $0 based on program. see website for more details https://krocsf.org/kroc-san-francisco/asp
agency: The Salvation Army Kroc Community Center
